data.eml:eml: A new species of Ornebius Guérin-Méneville, 1844 from East China (Orthoptera: Mogoplistidae: Mogoplistinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article He, Zhuqing, Liu, Hui Lu Yuqing, Li, Kai (2017): A new species of Ornebius Guérin-Méneville, 1844 from East China (Orthoptera: Mogoplistidae: Mogoplistinae). Zootaxa 4303 (3): 445-450, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4303.3.10
